summary: Replaces Blaze of Eventide with Arvak's model.
descriptionHtml:
Since apparently I like to have a diversity of Arvak's in games, this mod replaces Blaze of Eventide with Arvak's model and textures, while keeping the rest of his features intact. It comes in various flavors:

[list]
[*]Vanilla (black bones) Arvak with orange-colored flames
[*]Orange-flamed Arvak using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38432/?]Arvak Skeleton[/url] textures made by [b]cansu[/b].

[*]Game Jam version using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24019/?]Arvak Rewritten[/url] mesh and textures by [b]Oriius[/b].

[*]Flame Atronach version using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24019/?]Arvak Rewritten[/url] mesh and textures by [b]Oriius[/b].

[/list]
See the images for a visual example of each one.
author: Othienka
